title: ColumnGridResponse
description: Response containing all unique columns grouped by metadata similarity for grid-based editing.

columns.description: List of unique column names with their metadata groups.

totalUniqueColumns.description: Total number of unique column names.

totalOccurrences.description: Total number of column occurrences across all entities.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination (Base64-encoded). Use this in the next request to get the next page of results.

columnGridItem.description: A unique column name with its metadata groups.

totalOccurrences.description: Total number of occurrences for this column name.

hasVariations.description: Whether this column has different metadata across occurrences.

groups.description: Metadata groups - columns with identical metadata are grouped together.

columnMetadataGroup.description: A group of columns with identical metadata.

groupId.description: Unique identifier for this metadata group (hash of metadata values).

displayName.description: Display name (common across all columns in this group).

description.description: Description (common across all columns in this group).

tags.description: Tags (common across all columns in this group).

dataType.description: Data type (common across all columns in this group).

occurrenceCount.description: Number of column occurrences in this group.

occurrences.description: List of column occurrences in this group.

columnFQN.description: Fully qualified name of the column.

entityType.description: Type of entity containing the column.

entityFQN.description: Fully qualified name of the parent entity.

entityDisplayName.description: Display name of the parent entity.
